responsibilities: Act as a trusted advisor and coach to leaders in Research and Trust & Safety, including the Chief Science Officer and Head of Trust and Safety.

Provide support to employees and managers on all human resource-related topics throughout their lifecycle at Anthropic in partnership with other People team experts (e.g., Benefits, Compensation, etc.).
Work closely with management to create a culture of high performance based on values and team culture while ensuring performance management and employee relations issues are managed appropriately.

Act as a partner and liaison with specialist teams (e.g., Benefits, Compensation, etc.), leadership, and finance to help implement top-tier, scalable programs and policies to attract, retain, and grow outstanding talent at Anthropic.
Work on cross-functional projects with other HRBPs and partners in specialist teams to enable and grow the team (e.g., Manager training, etc.).
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on human resources, leadership coaching, employee relations, and talent management. There is no mention of tasks related to training or fine-tuning language models, which are technical activities typically associated with machine learning or AI roles. Therefore, this Activity is not relevant to the Job Responsibilities.

analysis: The Job Responsibilities do not include any tasks related to crafting or refining prompts for language models. The focus is on HR-related activities such as advising leaders, supporting employees, and managing performance. Prompt engineering is a technical task not aligned with these responsibilities.
